examples.example: 我们的目标是在未来几年内为两亿人提供优质的服务。

translate.english: Our goal is to provide high-quality services for 200 million people in the next few years.

examples.example: 我国有两亿多的中小学生，他们是祖国未来的希望。

translate.english: There are more than 200 million primary and secondary school students in our country, and they are the hope of the future of the motherland.

examples.example: 中国有着两亿多勤劳勇敢的人民，共同创造着美好的未来。

translate.english: China has more than 200 million hardworking and courageous people, jointly creating a beautiful future.
